abstract.p: Agilent Technologies warns that it will earn 18 cents to 22 cents a share, well short of 35 cents a share forecast by analysts; stock plunges $18, or almost 25 percent, to $55 in after-hours trading (S)

block.p: Agilent Technologies warned yesterday that it would earn 18 cents to 22 cents a share, well short of the 35 cents a share forecast by analysts. In after-hours trading, the stock plunged $18, or almost 25 percent, to $55. Agilent attributed the expected shortfall to capacity constraints and component shortages.
